title: Diamond Jadau Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Accents - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut Diamonds. Features vibrant Emerald (Panna) and Ruby (Manikyam) accents. Adorned with natural South Sea Pearls.
features: Exquisite Jadau craftsmanship, showcasing intricate floral motifs encrusted with diamonds. The central pendant features a layered design with a prominent Emerald at the core, surrounded by diamond-studded petals. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of classic elegance. Traditional South Indian 'Mango' (Maanga) design elements are subtly incorporated throughout the necklace.
colors: with vibrant pops of green (Emerald) and red (Ruby). The pearls offer a soft
occasions: and other special occasions. Also ideal for traditional ceremonies such as Seemantham and half-saree functions.
description: This Jadau Haaram represents the pinnacle of South Indian jewelry artistry. The combination of high-quality diamonds, vibrant gemstones, and lustrous pearls creates a breathtaking effect. The intricate Jadau setting showcases the exceptional skill of our artisans. A timeless investment piece that will be treasured for generations.
